name: Color Geometry 6 - Slither crossy game of switch color brick io to break reigns cubes
name_original: Color Geometry 6 - Slither crossy game of switch color brick io to break reigns cubes
description:
Color Geometry is an engaging puzzle game with a simple but distinctive gameplay. With it's easy to learn and fun to master gameplay. Color Geometry is the perfect mobile puzzle game.

Just drop blocks to create and destroy full lines on the screen both vertically and horizontally and keep the blocks from filling the screen in this addictive puzzle game.

No time limit, no colour match! Fill all the blocks with the matching colors and enjoy this puzzle game!
developers: Yummy Nature - Casual Game of Star Crush
